title: Web App
content: Add to home screen as app feature is available now for both Android and iOS. We highly recommended you to add oxyanime.to to home screen so that every of your next visit will be visiting the genuine oxyanime.to.

title: One piece
content: Gol D. Roger was known as the "Pirate King," the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and execution of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the existence of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece.

title: Vinland Saga S2
content: A new millennium begins in the southern part of the Jutland peninsula in Denmark. Thorfin was bought by the landowner Ketil as a "slave" and engaged in land reclamation work on his farm. Thorfinn meets a young man there, Einar, who was also a slave like him.
